The KYC(Know Your Customer) token is a non-transferable token representing the token holder has passed KYC verification.nCurrently, we support Binance Account Bound(BAB) token. Any Binance KYC user can request to issue a BAB token to their wallet. Instructions can be found [here](https://www.binance.com/en/support/faq/how-to-mint-binance-account-bound-bab-token-bacaf9595b52440ea2b023195ba4a09c).

Due to the limitation of Twitter API, Link3 can only track up to 1,000 concurrent users on mobile. If you joined the Twitter Space on web or there are too many people in the space, you may not be able to meet the requirement for claiming the token.

Successfully verifying your account with your work email grants you a \'Verified Member\' badge. Moreover, your verification will be securely recorded on the blockchain via the Ethereum Attestation Service.

Our community\'s authenticity is paramount. Thus, we validate emails using a carefully selected roster of recognized crypto firms and entities. If your work email is not on our list, submit it for consideration.
Are there other ways to complete verification on Link3?

"Beyond work email verification, you can also be verified upon receiving an invite from a Link3-recognized organization\'s admin. Accepting such an invitation will complete your verification instantly. "
Are you sure you want to replace your email?
Your current email address will be replaced with the work email you provided, for use on Link3.

Introducing paid messaging, Link3’s innovative pay-per-reply model. It dynamically sets a price for every verified professional on the network, taking into account their on-chain activities, reputation, contributions, and other factors.
If the message recipient responds within 48 hours, they can claim the funds. If they do not, funds are automatically refunded to the sender.
To learn more about Paid Messaging on Link3, please check out [title and link to intro blog].
Start chatting for free with your connection
・How do I get points by referral?
Both you and your invited friends will receive rewards when invited friend completes the organization identity verification.
Each successful referral will get you 50 points. If you invite your colleague to Link3, both of you will get 150 points.
